Regulation Name(s): Herpes Virus Nucleic Acid-Based Cutaneous And Mucocutaneous Lesion Panel
Specimen Container(s): Transport medium (Copan UTM, Remel M4RT, Remel M5, Remel M6)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Savanna HSV 1+2/VZV Assay, Control Set, and Instrument for qualitative real-time PCR detection of HSV-1, HSV-2, and VZV DNA from lesion swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated, rapid qualitative real-time PCR assay to detect and differentiate HSV-1, HSV-2, and VZV DNA in cutaneous or mucocutaneous lesion swabs from symptomatic patients suspected of herpes simplex or varicella-zoster infection; aids diagnosis but not for CNS or prenatal screening.
